                                CcddDialogHandler dialog)
        Create the button panel for the font/color chooser dialogs containing the Okay, Default, and Close buttons
        Parameters:
        okayAction - reference to the action listener to handle Okay button events
        defaultAction - reference to the action listener to handle Default button events
        dialog - reference to the dialog calling this method
        Returns:
        Reference to the font/color chooser button panel
